meanings.definition: A ridge or bump raised on the flesh, as by a blow or lash.
meanings.sent1: The weals on his arm showed where he had been hit.
meanings.sent2: She had weals on her back from the harsh whipping.
meanings.sent3: The weals on his forehead made him look like a bumpy road.
meanings.sent4: Her anger left weals on his heart that never healed.
meanings.sent5: The weals on the tree bark resembled tiny mountains.

meanings.definition: A mark left on the skin by a blow or lash.
meanings.sent1: The weals on her cheek were a painful reminder of the fight.
meanings.sent2: He winced as he touched the weals on his arm.
meanings.sent3: The weals on his back looked like secret messages in a strange language.
meanings.sent4: Her words left weals on his soul that no one could see.
meanings.sent5: The weals on the ground told a story of a struggle.

meanings.definition: A ridge or wale on a woven fabric.
meanings.sent1: The weals on the fabric added texture to the design.
meanings.sent2: She admired the weals on the cloth, appreciating the craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The weals on the blanket seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The weals on the dress were like gentle waves frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The weals on the rug gave it a unique and interesting pattern.
